column4: does omeone could tell me how to install a single file *.deb I've dowloaded ?

sudo dpkg -i ./foo.deb  The real question is why you needed to download it separately.  If there's something missing, it would be better to make sure it gets into the main Ubuntu main/universe achives
: is amsn in universe source so ?
there's about 15,000 packages in Debian and Unubtu universe.  I believe that is one of them
